texto: 90003™-2015 IEEE Standard Adoption of ISO/IEC 90003:2014, Software Engineering— Guidelines for the Application of ISO 9001:2008 to Computer Software Sponsor Software and Systems Engineering Standards Committee of the IEEE Computer Society Approved 3 September 2015 IEEE-SA Standards Board ed to: This subscription will expire on 30th November 2017. If you would like continued access please contact info@contentonline.co.uk. Downloaded on November 15,2017 at 12:57:47 UTC from IEE Abstract: This International Standard provides guidance for organizations in the application of ISO 9001:2008 to the acquisition, supply, development, operation, and maintenance of computer software and related support
